name: Two-Letter Scrabble Words A-Z Quiz | Alphabetical Words | 25 Questions

questions.text: Which ISN'T legal in Scrabble?
questions.explanation:
AC.

	Acronyms like AC (air conditioning) aren't legal in Scrabble. AR spells the letter R. An AL is an East Indian tree. An AI is a three-toed sloth.

questions.text: Which ISN'T legal in Scrabble?
questions.explanation:
BU.

	A person's BA is his or her eternal soul, in Egyptian mythology. BI means a bisexual person. BO means a pal.

questions.text: Using U.S. rules, are there any legal two-letter Scrabble words that begin with C?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Scrabble doesn't allow acronyms, but in the U.S., CA denotes California and CO denotes Colorado. A CD is a compact disc, and a CT (x-ray computed tomography) scan is a medical imaging procedure. I'm not sure, but I think CH might be legal if you are using British Scrabble rules.

questions.text: Which IS legal in Scrabble?
questions.explanation:
DE.

	DE means "of." It's used in names such as Lady Catherine de Bourgh. Don't ask me why it's a legal Scrabble word in U.S. English--it's French, isn't it?

questions.text: Which is NOT a legal word in Scrabble?
questions.explanation:
EB.

	ET is a colloquial past-tense form of "eat." EX means the letter X, and EF means the letter F.

questions.text: What does the legal Scrabble word FA mean?
questions.correct: the 4th tone of the musical scale
options: the 1st tone of the musical scale
the 5th tone of the musical scale
questions.explanation:
the 4th tone of the musical scale.

	Do, re, mi, fa, so, la, ti, do.

questions.text: Under U.S. rules, besides GO, are there any other legal two-letter Scrabble words beginning with G?
options: No, GO is the only one.
questions.explanation:
Yes, GI is legal.

	A gi is a uniform that is used in some martial arts.  As I said, Scrabble doesn't allow acronyms. When someone "bets on the GGs" he or she places bets on horseraces. A GP is a doctor who is a general practitioner.

questions.text: Which word IS legal in Scrabble?
questions.explanation:
HM.

	HM means "hmm." Other legal words with H include HA, HI, HE, HO, AH, OH, and UH. H is among my favorite letters in Scrabble, because if you place it on a triple-letter score, you can usually get 24 points from that tile alone.

questions.text: What does the legal Scrabble word ID mean?
questions.explanation:
a part of the psyche.

	Other legal I words include AI, BI, HI, LI, and PI.

questions.text: Which IS a legal Scrabble word?
questions.explanation:
JO.

	JO means girlfriend (or boyfriend, I'm told).

questions.text: What does the legal Scrabble word KA mean?
questions.correct: the spiritual self of a human being
options: an insect that lived during the Mesozoic Era
questions.explanation:
the spiritual self of a human being.

	KA and BA are both ancient Egyptian words. KI, another legal word, means "a life-sustaining force" (like QI).

questions.text: Which is NOT a legal Scrabble word?
questions.explanation:
LE.

	LA is the sixth note on the musical scale. A LI is a Chinese unit of distance. You've probably seen the interjection LO in fairytales: "Lo and behold!"

questions.text: Which IS a legal Scrabble word?
questions.explanation:
MM.

	MM means "yes" (an interjection that expresses assent or satisfaction).

questions.text: Which is NOT a legal Scrabble word?
questions.explanation:
NI.

	NU spells a Greek letter. NA means "no." NE means "born with the name of," the masculine form of NEE.

questions.text: Which is NOT a legal Scrabble word?
questions.explanation:
OA.

	An OE is a whirlwind (off the Faeroe islands). OD means, according to the Scrabble dictionary, "a hypothetical force of natural power." OM is a mantra.

questions.text: Which of these IS a legal Scrabble word?
questions.explanation:
PE.

	PE is a Hebrew letter.

questions.text: Which IS a legal Scrabble word?
questions.explanation:
RE.

	RE is the second tone in the musical scale. Other legal 2-letter words with R include AR, ER, and of course OR.

questions.text: Which is NOT a legal Scrabble word?
questions.explanation:
SS.

	SI means the same thing as TI (the seventh tone of the musical scale). Who knew? SH means "Hush!"

questions.text: Which is NOT a legal Scrabble word?
questions.explanation:
TU.

	TI is the seventh tone of the musical scale. TA means "thanks."

questions.text: Which IS a legal Scrabble word?
questions.explanation:
UT.

	UT is a musical term.

questions.text: Are there any two-letter legal Scrabble words that include V?
questions.explanation:
No, none.

	Nope, not a one. If you get a V, don't keep it until the end of the game. IVY is a good three-letter word with V in it. So is VIE.

questions.text: Which IS a legal Scrabble word?
questions.explanation:
WO.

	WO means woe.

questions.text: Which IS a legal Scrabble word?
questions.explanation:
XI.

	XI is a Greek letter. Other legal X words include XU, AX, EX, and OX.

questions.text: Which is NOT a legal Scrabble word?
questions.explanation:
YI.

	YE means "you." YA means "yes." YO means "hello." The words AY and OY are also legal.

questions.text: Which of these IS a legal Scrabble word?
questions.explanation:
ZA.

	ZA is a legal Scrabble word. It's short for pizza. By the way, even though BZ isn't legal, BIZ is (it's short for business). WIZ is a good one, too, as is FEZ.
